ValidationRule.description: Ensures Role and Skill are Blank if Project Rate Type is Standard
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(amc__Rate_Type__c, "Standard"), OR( ISBLANK(amc__Project__c), NOT(ISBLANK(amc__Role__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(amc__Skill__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(amc__Rate_Card_Entry__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Project must contain a value, Role, Skill and Rate Card Entry must be empty
